label: Microsoft Band
content:
I worked as the team lead for the front-end team developing the angular application that drives the Microsoft online version of their phone application for managing their fitness tracker, "band".

My team was responsible for creation of all middle tier and front-end code. We developed the application on-site in Redmond, teaming up with the combined Razorfish and Microsoft creative/UX departments, the Microsoft Health cloud team, and a team of multiple back-end developers on the Microsoft side.

Over the course of several months we worked to create and deliver v1.0 of the application, which got good praise from critics.
